title: Frodo, Reluctant Adventurer (T) (2C102T)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Companion • Hobbit
Strength:	3
Vitality:	4
Resistance:	10
Signet:	Aragorn
Game Text:	Ring-bound. Ring-bearer. The cost of each artifact, possession, and [Shire] tale played on Frodo is -1.
Lore:	”'I am not made for perilous quests. I wish I had never seen the Ring! Why did it come to me? Why was I chosen?'”
Rarity:	C
Notes:	Tengwar
